timeline.message: Made per owner class list ordered by lexicographic classid. Made use of ID_COMPARATOR.
Added flag to control parallel scanners in order to preserve GTS order.

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason this constructor is not given ID_COMPARATOR?
timeline.author: ftence
ftence
